title: Convergence of Civic Engagement and Mathematics: Social Problem-Solving Projects Through Discussion

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical and data interpretation skills, general understanding of civil society issues
context.additional_context: Learners analyze local community issues using mathematical tools and participate in projects proposing civic engagement solutions through discussion-based collaboration. Mobile platforms provide microlearning content and real-time discussion sessions by topic

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically analyze data from given social issues and present results using visualization tools.
Learners can design civic engagement strategies by integrating diverse perspectives through discussion-based learning.
Learners can propose concrete solutions to civic problems, such as budget allocation and policy effectiveness prediction, by applying mathematical modeling.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
